game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact from the dragon's den
game.description: You are tasked with infiltrating the dragon's den to retrieve a lost artifact believed to possess immense power. You'll have to outwit the dragon and avoid its fire breath to succeed.
game.reward: 5000 gold pieces and a magical sword

task.description: Travel through the enchanted forest and across the treacherous mountains to locate the dragon's den
Find a way to retrieve the artifact from the dragon without being detected.
After securing the artifact, make your way back to King Arthur's court and present him the treasure.
